mpoly 1.1.1.900
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Enumerate integer r-vectors summing to n

Source: R/burst.R
burst.Rd

Determine all r-vectors with nonnegative integer entries summing to n. Note that this is not intended to be optimized.

burst(n, r = n)

Arguments

n

integer to sum to
r

number of components

Value

a matrix whose rows are the n-tuples

Examples

burst(4)
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#>  [1,]    0    0    0    4
#>  [2,]    0    0    4    0
#>  [3,]    0    4    0    0
#>  [4,]    4    0    0    0
#>  [5,]    0    0    1    3
#>  [6,]    0    0    3    1
#>  [7,]    0    1    0    3
#>  [8,]    0    1    3    0
#>  [9,]    0    3    0    1
#> [10,]    0    3    1    0
#> [11,]    1    0    0    3
#> [12,]    1    0    3    0
#> [13,]    1    3    0    0
#> [14,]    3    0    0    1
#> [15,]    3    0    1    0
#> [16,]    3    1    0    0
#> [17,]    0    0    2    2
#> [18,]    0    2    0    2
#> [19,]    0    2    2    0
#> [20,]    2    0    0    2
#> [21,]    2    0    2    0
#> [22,]    2    2    0    0
#> [23,]    0    1    1    2
#> [24,]    0    1    2    1
#> [25,]    0    2    1    1
#> [26,]    1    0    1    2
#> [27,]    1    0    2    1
#> [28,]    1    1    0    2
#> [29,]    1    1    2    0
#> [30,]    1    2    0    1
#> [31,]    1    2    1    0
#> [32,]    2    0    1    1
#> [33,]    2    1    0    1
#> [34,]    2    1    1    0
#> [35,]    1    1    1    1

burst(4, 4)
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#>  [1,]    0    0    0    4

#>  [3,]    0    4    0    0

#> [22,]    2    2    0    0
#> [23,]    0    1    1    2
#> [24,]    0    1    2    1
#> [25,]    0    2    1    1

burst(4, 3)
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3]
#>  [1,]    0    0    4
#>  [2,]    0    4    0
#>  [3,]    4    0    0
#>  [4,]    0    1    3
#>  [5,]    0    3    1
#>  [6,]    1    0    3
#>  [7,]    1    3    0
#>  [8,]    3    0    1
#>  [9,]    3    1    0
#> [10,]    0    2    2
#> [11,]    2    0    2
#> [12,]    2    2    0
#> [13,]    1    1    2
#> [14,]    1    2    1
#> [15,]    2    1    1
burst(4, 2)
#>      [,1] [,2]
#> [1,]    0    4
#> [2,]    4    0
#> [3,]    1    3
#> [4,]    3    1
#> [5,]    2    2

rowSums(burst(4))
#>  [1] 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4
rowSums(burst(4, 3))
#>  [1] 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4
rowSums(burst(4, 2))
#> [1] 4 4 4 4 4
